actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

official_title: A bill to direct the heads of Federal public land management agencies to prepare reports on the availability of public access and egress to Federal public land for hunting, fishing, and other recreational purposes, to amend the Land and Water Conservation Fund Act of 1965 to provide funding for recreational public access to Federal land, and for other purposes.
subjects: Wilderness and natural areas, wildlife refuges, wild rivers, habitats

titles.title: Hunt Unrestricted on National Treasures Act

A bill to direct the heads of Federal public land management agencies to prepare reports on the availability of public access and egress to Federal public land for hunting, fishing, and other recreational purposes, to amend the Land and Water Conservation Fund Act of 1965 to provide funding for recreational public access to Federal land, and for other purposes.
